### Additional Notes
<!-- Any additional context or notes for reviewers -->

---

**For Reviewers:**
- You can mention `@codegen` in comments to ask for clarifications or request changes
- If CI checks fail, Codegen will automatically attempt to fix them (up to 3 retries)
- Use the Codegen PR review for AI-powered insights

**Codegen Commands:**
- `@codegen propose plan` - Show implementation plan
- `@codegen add tests` - Add test coverage
- `@codegen update docs` - Update documentation
- `@codegen fix checks` - Fix failing CI checks manually
